TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HelpEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件發生於使用者要求控制項的說明。The event occurs when the user requests help for a control. A物件指定螢幕座標，以及滑鼠指標是否處理事件。A object specifies the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer and whether the event was handled. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範處理事件，以包含四個地址欄位的表單上顯示自訂的說明內容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中，或使用 [即時線上說明] 按鈕，按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標，就會引發事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 屬性設定為 true，表示`HelpRequested`處理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 此範例也示範儲存中的說明文字屬性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

span.span: The coordinates of the mouse pointer.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Handled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Handled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否已處理說明事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the help event was handled.

value.span: 如果事件已處理則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the event is handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您未設定這個屬性`true`事件將會傳遞至 Windows 進行其他處理。If you do not set this property to `true` the event will be passed to Windows for additional processing. ## Examples 下列範例示範處理事件，以包含四個地址欄位的表單上顯示自訂的說明內容。The following example demonstrates handling the event to display custom Help content on a form containing four address fields. 按 F1 鍵將焦點放在 [位址] 欄位中，或使用 [即時線上說明] 按鈕，按一下 [位址] 欄位說明資料指標，就會引發事件。The event is raised either by pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, or by the using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field. 屬性設定為 true，表示`HelpRequested`處理事件。The property is set to true to indicate that the `HelpRequested` event is handled. 此範例也示範儲存中的說明文字屬性。The example also demonstrates storing the Help text in the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CPP/helpevent.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/CS/helpevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpEventHandler/VB/helpevent.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MousePos As Point
public: property System::Drawing::Point MousePos { System::Drawing::Point get(); };

summary.span: 取得滑鼠指標的螢幕座標。

span.span: Gets the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.
A representing the screen coordinates of the mouse pointer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這項資訊來提供滑鼠指標位置為基礎的說明。You can use this information to provide help based on the position of the mouse pointer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`Control1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#39)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#39)]
